card.name: Unforgiving Nightmare
card.text: You control target player during that player's next turn. Discard your hand.

card.name: Dance with Fatality
card.text: Roll a d20. 1-5 | Each opponent sacrifices two creatures. 6-10 | Each opponent discards two cards. 11+ | Each opponent loses 5 life.

card.name: Ghoulcalling
card.text: When this enchantment enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, exile up to one target creature card from a graveyard. If you exiled a card this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 1/1 white Spirit with flying.

card.name: Barren Doom
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a nonland, nontoken permanent of their choice. If that player can't, they discard two cards, they lose 3 life, you draw two cards, you gain 3 life, then you sacrifice this enchantment.

card.name: Bowmaster Revenant
card.text: Flash Deathtouch When this creature enters, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Corpsewail Corsair
card.text: Menace, deathtouch Whenever this creature attacks, you lose 1 life and draw a card. Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Midnight Prowl
card.text: Creatures you control gain intimidate until end of turn. (They canâ€™t be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with them.) Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and that player loses 1 life.

card.name: Afflicted Dagger
card.text: When this Equipment enters, attach it to target creature. Whenever this Equipment becomes attached to a creature, this Equipment deals 2 damage to that creature. Equipped creature gets +3/+0. Equip {0}. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Blighted Stinger
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

card.name: Fading Battlefield
card.text: Vanishing 2 (This land enters with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) {T}: Add {B} for each time counter on this land.

card.name: Necropolis Seed Engine
card.text: When this artifact enters or leaves the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices two creatures. Sacrifice this artifact: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Malevolent Tranquility
card.text: Flahs Creatures get -1/-1

card.name: Opalescent Effacement
card.text: Converge - Target player loses 2 life for each color of mana spent to cast this spell.

card.name: Bloodcrazed Brawler
card.text: This creature costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you lost this turn. {B}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Grave Trawler
card.text: When this creature enters or leaves the battlefield, mill three cards. At the beginning of your end step, mill a card.

card.name: Spellbomb Detonation
card.text: Spellbomb Detonation deals 1 damage to any target. Flashback - Sacrifice an artifact. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Glitterfowl Curio
card.text: When this artifact enters or leaves the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card. {R}, Sacrifice this artifact: Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Divine Deflagration
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Divine Deflagration deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target white and/or blue creatures.

card.name: Stonesmelt Regent
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, it deals 2 damage to any target. Evoke - Sacrifice an artifact or land.

card.name: Artificial Creativity
card.text: Destroy X target artifacts. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until an artifact card is revealed and exiles that card. Those players put the exiled cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Starfall Impact
card.text: Create a tapped colorless artifact token named Meteorite with "When this token enters, it deals 2 damage to any target." and "{T}" Add one mana of any color." Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Force of Impulse
card.text: You may pay 1 life and exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn you may play those cards.

card.name: Agony Revenant
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, discard your hand, then draw three cards. Escape - {2}{R}{R}, Exil efive other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.) This creature escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Guide of Questionable Authenticity
card.text: Haste Whenever this creature attacks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, this creature deals 4 damage to you.

card.name: Ire
card.text: Double strike When this creature enters, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. Evoke - Exile a red card from your hand.

card.name: Omicron Cannoneer
card.text: Ward {1} Whenever this creature or another artifact you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and it deals damage equal to its power to each opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Candid Scoundrel
card.text: Menace When this creature enters, choose one - â€¢ Discard a card, then draw a card. â€¢ Create a Treasure token. â€¢ Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature. â€¢ This creature deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Onyx Instigator
card.text: Flying Whenever a palyer draws a card, this creature deals 2 damage to that player. Players can't gain life. Damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Parallax Blaze
card.text: This enchantment enters with 4 fate counters on it. Remove a fate counter from this enchantment: This enchantment deals 3 damage to target creature. If there are no fate counters on this enchantment, sacrifice it. Activate only once each turn. Damage isn't removed from creatures during cleanup steps.

card.name: Chandra, Young Pyromancer
card.text: When Chandra enters, it deals 2 damage to each opponent. [+1]: Create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn. [-3]: Discard two cards, then draw two cards. For each nonland card discarded this way, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

card.name: Lunar Armageddon
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, destroy target nonbasic land chosen at random.

card.name: Kaleidoclasm
card.text: Converge - Kaleidoclasm deals damage to each creature equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

card.name: Delusions of Grandeur
card.text: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. It gets +2/+0 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Pryoclastic Captain
card.text: When this creature enters, add {R}. Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, this creature becomes a 4/4 Elemental with flying and haste in addition to its other types until end of turn.

card.name: Smiting Bolt
card.text: Smiting Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Crust Dismantler
card.text: Trample, haste When this Vehicle enters, destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent. Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to a player, draw two cards, then discard a card. Then, if each player descended this turn, destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent. Crew 2

card.name: Nissa, Unbound Animist
card.text: [+1]: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. [0]: Create an X/X green elemental creature token, where X is Nissa's loyalty. [-3]: Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.text: Choose one or both- â€¢ Exile target artifact or enchantment. â€¢ Exile target card from a graveyard. Forestcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Crystalline Petroglyph
card.text: When this artifact enters or leaves the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {1}{G}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 4 life.

card.name: Lifecraft Sprite
card.text: Flying Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.) Whenever an artifact you control enters, you gain X life, where X is this creature's toughness.

card.name: Skysprite Germinator
card.text: Flash Flying When this creature enters, mill four cards. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Force of Burgeoning
card.text: You may pay 1 life and exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

card.name: Thriving Order
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card with mana value 5 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Llanowar Tracker
card.text: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Amathrassil, Crux of Bounty
card.text: {T}, Exert Amathrassil: Put a bounty counter on Amathrassil. Add X mana in any combination of colors, draw X cards, and create an X/X green Elemental creature token, where X is the number of bounty counters on Amathrassil. (An exerted permanent won't untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: Oldgrowth Treant
card.text: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, choose two - â€¢ Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. â€¢ You gain 4 life. â€¢ Draw a card. â€¢ Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. â€¢ Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Bile
card.text: Flash Deathtouch When this creature enters, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment. Evoke - Exile a green card from your hand.

card.name: Wilderness Rendezvous
card.text: Flash At the beginning of your end step, untap all permanents you control.

card.name: Odyssey
card.text: When this enchantment enters, untap up to two lands. At the beginning of each end step, if you've cast both a creature spell and a noncreature spell this turn, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bonded Hermit
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, look at the top six cards of your library. Put a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Polychrome Metamorphosis
card.text: Converge - Untap up to one target land for each color of mana spent to cast this spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Arboreal Majesty
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, draw a card.
